data.title: Manuel Villar
data.meta_description: #3 Manuel Villar on the 2024 Philippines 50 Richest - Manuel Villar chairs property developer Vista Land & Lifescapes run by his son Manuel Paolo.  Villar's
data.text:
Leverkusen Continues Uncanny Form By Beating Stuttgart In The DFL Supercup

Bayer Leverkusen has continued its remarkable domestic form by winning the DFL Supercup against VfB Stuttgart in dramatic fashion on penalties (4-3).

Leverkusen Boss Simon Rolfes Wants To Remain ‘Courageous’ Ahead Of New Season

Bayer Leverkusen director of sport Simon Rolfes believes it will take "courageous" decisions to maintain the club's success.

RB Leipzig Has Signed $23 Million Rated Antonio Nusa To Replace Dani Olmo

Just days after selling Dani Olmo to Barcelona, RB Leipzig announced that the club had signed Antonio Nusa from Brugge.

Why Dortmund Moved Fast To Sign $32.8 Million Rated Maximilian Beier

Less than a week after selling Niclas Füllkrug to West Ham, Borussia Dortmund has found a replacement in highly rated Hoffenheim forward Maximilian Beier.

Manuel Rodriguez, Edwin Uceta ‘Tremendous’ In Tampa Bay Rays’ Revamped Bullpen

While the credit is to be shared far and wide for Tampa Bay's bullpen success, right-handers Manuel Rodriguez and Edwin Uceta have been particularly impressive.

How VfB Stuttgart Won The Race To Sign $32.8 Million Rated Deniz Undav

Bundesliga club VfB Stuttgart has won the race to sign $32.8 million rated Deniz Undav from Premier league side Brighton.

Mario Götze Believes Frankfurt’s US Tour Will Help Grow The Bundesliga

Eintracht Frankfurt hopes that this summer's North America tour will lead to bigger exposure in key markets like the United States.

Why Dortmund Moved Fast To Sign Pascal Groß From Brighton

By adding Pascal Groß, Dortmund has added a missing piece to its lineup and signed one of Europe's elite midfielders.

How Will The Hiroki Ito Injury Impact Bayern Munich’s Transfer Window?

Bayern Munich's new center-back Hiroki Ito was injured in a friendly against Düren. What does that mean for the club's transfer plans this summer?

Why Leverkusen Is Reluctant To Sell $32 Million Rated Jonathan Tah To Bayern

Will Jonathan Tah join Bayern Munich or see out the final year of his contract with Bayer Leverkusen?

$63 Million Rated Michael Olise Highlights Star Potential At The Olympics

With his goal over the United States, Michael Olise highlighted his star potential for Bayern Munich.

Why Bayern Munich Is Ready To Sell $33 Million Rated Noussair Mazraoui

While Bayern Munich has been pushing to sell Matthijs de Ligt to Man United in Noussair Mazraoui, another candidate could now leave the club.

Stuttgart Sign $23 Million Rated Ermedin Demirovic To Replace Serhou Guirassy

VfB Stuttgart has paid a record transfer fee to sign Ermedin Demirovic from FC Augsburg. The Bosnian striker will replace Serhou Guirassy.

After 45 Goals In 131 Games, Thomas Müller Retires From International Soccer

After scoring 45 goals in 131 games for Germany, Thomas Müller has announced his retirement from international soccer.

Property Billionaire Manuel Villar Is On A Roll With New Casino And Media Ventures

The country’s second-richest plans to build one million new homes and develop his media company into the Philippines' version of Disney.
